pages.text: The $(mob)Ender Girl$() is a helper that can be spawned from the $(thing)Ender Girl Egg$(). It flees when attacked, but can trade various items in exchange for $(item)Ender Pearls$(), similar to a $(l:minecraft_villager)$(mob)Villager$().
$(mob)Ender Girls$() can drop a $(item)Ender Girl Egg$() on death. This item can be used to spawn a passive $(mob)Ender Girl$() helper for the player.
